PageTitle: Online TXT to DOCX converter | ONLYOFFICE
PageDescription: Convert TXT files to DOCX online for further editing. Free and easy to use. No registration required.
LearnMoreText: Convert TXT files into Microsoft-compatible DOCX documents online. Simply drag and drop or upload your TXT file and get the converted DOCX document in seconds. Don't worry about the privacy of your data — all files you upload are reliably encrypted. Start editing your converted DOCX files right in your browser. Create a free account to edit, share and collaborate on your documents and other office files with other people in real time. Enable the built-in AI assistant to polish your texts online.
